name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Final Sign Off
Acceptance Criteria - All below requirements are met and approved by ER
Verifying Document - Referenced Item numbers as below
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Review
Acceptance Criteria - All barrier componants comply to the relevant specification as per NZTA M23.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Design submission & review
Acceptance Criteria - Engineer to review and approve
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Site inspection
Acceptance Criteria - Engineer to review barrier setout onsite and approve.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Site Inspection
Acceptance Criteria - Engineer to inspect excavated foundation prior to anchor block pour.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Site Inspection
Acceptance Criteria - Concrete works shall be constructed to the line and levels detailed on the drawings, and finished to a smooth suface with no significant cracks, spalling or exposed reinforcing.
○ Concrete dockets to be provided to engineer.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Site inspection
Acceptance Criteria - Edge marker posts to be installed along w-beam at standard spacing intervals
○ Wire rope barriers to have reflectorised top caps every 3rd post.
○ Leading end terminals to have Hazard/width marker where required
○ Wire rope barrier leading end terminals installed with RD6L signage
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Witnessed pull test
Acceptance Criteria - No visual damage to occur to posts or foundation as a result of the pull test. Any damage is to be rectified prior to sign off & string retested.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Check Sheet
Acceptance Criteria - Contractor to provide end terminal check sheet signed by a suitably qualified person.
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Survey As-Built
Acceptance Criteria - As-built to show Barrier constructed as per design and within tolerences as per m23
